name: SALVINO STEEL & IRON WORKS, INC., Appellant, v. FLETCHER & SONS, INC., Fireman's Fund Insurance Co., and American Insurance Company
name_abbreviation: Salvino Steel & Iron Works, Inc. v. Fletcher & Sons, Inc.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: SALVINO STEEL & IRON WORKS, INC., Appellant, v. FLETCHER & SONS, INC., Fireman’s Fund Insurance Co., and American Insurance Company.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Neil M. Hilkert, Lansdale, for appellant.
Roy S. Cohen, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
601 A.2d 806
SALVINO STEEL & IRON WORKS, INC., Appellant, v. FLETCHER & SONS, INC., Fireman’s Fund Insurance Co., and American Insurance Company.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 22, 1992.
Decided Feb. 14, 1992.
Neil M. Hilkert, Lansdale, for appellant.
Roy S. Cohen, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
